content: Thivya KANDAPPU | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Thivya KANDAPPU Full-time Faculty Assistant Professor of Computer Science; ResWORK Fellow Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, University of New South Wales, 2014 Teaching Topics Mobile and Pervasive Computing Programming with Data Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to WITHANA KANKANAMALAGE Gevindu Ganganath Sumanasekara +65 68085446 thivyak@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsHuman-Machine Collaborative SystemsPervasive Sensing & SystemsHuman-Computer InteractionLearning & WorkTechnology-Enhanced Learning & PedagogyFuture of WorkHealth & WellbeingAgeing & Mental Health Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
